In contrast, raw milk contains its own built-in antimicrobial system that keeps pathogenic bacteria in check. Of course, it's crucial to source raw milk from a reputable farm practicing excellent animal husbandry and hygiene. But when obtained from a trusted source, raw milk is a nutrient-dense, health-promoting food that is safer and more beneficial than the pasteurized milk most people consume.
